org.jerkar.builtins.javabuild
Class JkResourceProcessor

java.lang.Object
  org.jerkar.builtins.javabuild.JkResourceProcessor

public final class JkResourceProcessor
extends java.lang.Object

This processor basically copies some resource files to a target folder (generally the class folder). It can also proceed to token replacement, i.e replacing strings between ${ and } by a specified values.
The processor is constructed using a list of JkDirSets and for each of them, we can associate a map of token to replace.

Method Detail

of

public static JkResourceProcessor of(JkFileTreeSet dirSet)
Creates a JkResourceProcessor from the given JkFileTreeSet without processing any token replacement.

of

public static JkResourceProcessor of(JkFileTreeSet dirSet,
                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> tokenValues)
Creates a JkResourceProcessor from the given JkFileTreeSet and processes replacement on specified token.
For example, if you want to replace, ${date} by 2015-01-30 then you have to fill the specified tokenValues map with the following entry : "date" -> "2015-01-30" (without the quotes).

of

public static JkResourceProcessor of(JkFileTreeSet dirSet,
                                     java.lang.String token,
                                     java.lang.String value,
                                     java.lang.String... others)
Creates a JkResourceProcessor from the given JkFileTreeSet and processes replacement on specified tokens by the specified values.
Its just a shorthand for of(JkFileTreeSet, Map) specifying tokens/values map in-line.

generateTo

Actually processes the resources, meaning copies the resources to the specified output directory along replacing specified tokens.
